Articles.Content: I think that we need bigger wings to attach Goliath motors, for example, the wings of the Stearwing A300 don't look good (from my point of view)
I think we need large modular wings like we all wanted when they gave us the overly restrictive ones we have now.

This. Also hope you wanted a 2.5m engine with a big pylon on it, because that's what you're getting.
more pieces of the Big S wings would be nice, at least something between the Big S Streak and the Big S Delta wing with a decent slope to it

The big deltas are too small for anything but the smallest of Mk3 ships; they'll do okay for a 20-40 capacity crew shuttle or a cargo lifter for small-but-awkward payloads, but nothing really substantial. The big swept wings do fine for most larger ships (ISRU-carrying grand tourers, heavy tankers and space station lifters), but takeoff speeds get a bit ridiculous at the heavier end of the scale.

The problem is the lack of variety. Everything built with the deltas looks Shuttle-ish (unless you mid-mount them, which gives you something like a stumpy dolphin...), everything built with the swept wings is C-17 or 747-ish. Modular wings definitely required.
